H0.text: Quiet zones are needed to ensure the safety of students while conducting an experiment on gravity.

H1.text: Drop zones are needed to ensure the safety of students while conducting an experiment on gravity.

H2.text: Heavy objects are needed to ensure the safety of students while conducting an experiment on gravity.

H3.text: Frictionless surfaces are needed to ensure the safety of students while conducting an experiment on gravity.

A4.text: The importance of appropriate drop zone arrangement and support even more valid.

A5.text: STANAG regulation suggests that there should be at least two trained members of personnel servicing a DZ.
